Detailed Description

manages locales and translations ported from qooxdoo javascript implementation this is only a stub which does not do any translation yet to be implemented & turned into an interface/abstract class - we can implement gettext-based, db-based, file-based etc. although gettext-based makes most sense since qooxdoo frontend can use those, too.

qcl/locale/ |-- locale.php abstract class |-- gettext.php subclass |-- db.php subclass etc.

qcl_locale_manager::trn ( $  singularMessageId,
$  pluralMessageId,
$  count,
$  varargs 
)

Translate a plural message

Depending on the third argument the plursl or the singular form is chosen.

static

Parameters:
string $singularMessageId message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
string $pluralMessageId message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
int $count if greater than 1 the plural form otherwhise the singular form is returned.
array $varargs variable number of argumes applied to the format string
Returns:
string

qcl_locale_manager::getLanguage (  ) 

Get the language code of the currnt locale

This is the first part of a locale definition. The language for "de_DE" would be "de"

member

{String} language code
